su03t.su03tSetSerial|block: SU-03T initialization|B6 connected to %pinTX|B7 connected to %pinRX
su03t.su03tSpeakSomething|block: SU-03T transmits the number to the chip and speaks %myCommand|Number (integer)%myNum
su03t.su03tSpeakFloat|block: SU-03T transmits numbers to the chip and speaks %myCommand|value%myNum
